name: 王正豪
objective:
This course introduces the methods and applications of big data analytics.
The topics include big data management, data mining techniques, big data platforms, and project implementation and presentation.
Students are expected to learn the concepts of big data analytics techniques, and their applications and future trends in different case studies.
schedule:
Part I: Data mining concepts  (6 wks)
1. Introduction to big data concepts & data preprocessing (1 wk)
2. Frequent pattern mining (2 wks)
3. Data classification (2 wks)
4. Data clustering (1 wk)

Week #8: Midterm exam (1 wk)

Note: I'm responsible for the first part in 6 weeks (Week 2-7).
scorePolicy:
For Part I:
- Homework assignments: ~60%
- Midterm exam: ~40%

The percentage of your score in Part I will be around 1/3 of the total score. It's roughly related to the number of weeks, and will be confirmed with Prof. Cheng.
materials:
- Textbook:
Jiawei Han, Micheline Kamber, and Jian Pei, Data Mining: Concepts and Techniques, 4th edition, Morgan Kaufmann, 2022.

- References:
1. Jimmy Lin and Chris Dyer, Data-Intensive Text Processing with MapReduce, 
Morgan & Claypool Publishers, 2010.
2. Holden Karau, andy Konwinski, Patrick Wendell, and Matei Zaharia, Learning Spark: Lightning-fast data analysis, O'Reilly, 2015.
3. Recent academic papers, tutorials, and slides.
consultation: The teacher can be reached via e-mail or messages in Microsoft Teams.The TA will help you join the course group in Facebookwhere you can also ask questions about the homeworks and exams.
課程是否導入AI: ● 使用生成式 AI 作為教學過程的輔助工具（Use generative AI tools as an aid to the teaching process）● 深入探討 AI 的原理與應用（Explore the principles and applications of AI in depth）
remarks: All course sessions will be recorded whenever possible, and put on Microsoft Teams and iSchool+, along with all course materials, homework announcements and submissions.Latest news available soon at: https://chriswjh.github.io/BDA_IMBA/

name: 鄭麗珍
objective:
本課程介紹大數據在各個領域決策制定的應用，課程內容包括大數據分析與應用、大數據管理、大數據分法與策略、資料探勘介紹、資料探勘方法、大數據平台、大數據行銷實務、大數據個案分析、期末專題製作與報告。學生可以經由多個案例學習大數據的應用實務、目前技術與未來發展方向。這門課要閱讀期刊論文 且要熟悉 python 
This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for the efficiency of decision making in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which are including: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business Analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic to add value to business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.
schedule:
Topic I:  data preprocessing and DM tool
   1. Be familiar of business analytics potential and dangers in today’s data rich-environment
  2. Gain experience using key data mining methods of classification, prediction, data reduction and exploration
   3. Know how to decide when to use which technique
   4. Be able to implement major data mining techniques using software
Topic II 
    paper study 
    project development
scorePolicy:
paper study and presentation and feedback：20％
Hand on lab 40%

Final team project report  and presentation: 40%
This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical base
NOTE: This is an advanced course.   Student also should familiar with python
materials: Data Mining for Business Analytics [Python Edition](link is external), John Wiley & Sons, 2019
